alert.note: Alert for Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 1:29AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Geneva, south central Houston, northwestern Jackson, Walton, Holmes and northwestern Washington Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 128 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Geneva to 12 miles south of Samson to 8 miles northwest of Valparaiso. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 110 AM CDT, the Crestview Airport in Okaloosa County measured a gust of 39 mph. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Graceville, De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Geneva, Santa Rosa Beach, Hartford, Slocomb, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Freeport, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Esto, Westville, Coffee Springs, Noma, Black, Oakwood Hills and Cluster Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
